full_translation:
**The Scripture of the Auspicious Divine Incantations of the Great Cavern**

**Scripture Title:** *The Scripture of the Auspicious Divine Incantations of the Great Cavern*
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Song-Yuan period.
**Volume:** One.
**Source Text:** *Wanli Continuation of the Daoist Canon*.

---

**The Scripture of the Auspicious Divine Incantations of the Great Cavern**

The One Hundred Great Auspicious *Tanchizhun* Divine Incantations:
The Primordial Beginning’s Skillful and Harmonious Opening of the Truth’s Gate—
The One Hundred Great Auspicious *Tanchizhun* Jade-Sound Divine Incantations:

The Venerable One of Vast Light and Salvation,
The Heart of the Great Mystery’s True Unity.
The Great Cavern’s Cinnabar Abyss of Power,
The Pure and Harmonious Auspicious Sound.

*Shi, shi, shi*—the Three Qi,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Brahma-Sound of the Great Brahma Qi,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Heavenly Sound of Pure and Wondrous Tone,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Emperor’s Heart Samadhi Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Jade-Sound of Fragrant Splendor,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Void-Sound of the Dao’s Radiant Master,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Soundless Sound of Wondrous Penetration of the Mysterious,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Inner Sound Proclaimed by the Dao’s Ancestor,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Primal Sound of the Great One’s Primordial Sovereign,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Lofty Sound of Wondrous Conduct,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Golden Sound of Incomparable Tone,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Nine Numinous Jade Mother’s Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Eastern Father’s Divine Sound of Splendor,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Yi*-Sound of the Profound Abyss’s Venerable One,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Hong*-Cavern’s Numinous Sound of Compassion,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Kui*-Sound of the Cavern’s Empty Fragrance,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Wheel-Sound of the Great Dragon’s Radiance,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Wind-Sound of the Eight Harmonious Spirits,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *He*-Sound of the Cavern’s Contemplative Splendor,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Kai*-Sound of the Cavern’s Luminous Lamp,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Congealing and Dispelling Sound of the Heavenly Emperor,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Xie*-Sound of the Cavern’s Mysterious Water,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Cloud-Clearing Radiance of the Great Florescence’s Fragrance,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *He*-Sound of the Cavern’s Subtle Fruit,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Chou*-Sound of the Cavern’s Numinous Sprout,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Yuan*-Abyss’s Power of the Central Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Cavern’s Source of Golden Nectar,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Jade and Rose-Gem’s Mysterious Breast Taste,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Sound of Golden Rice Offering,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Cavern’s Void of Yellow Primordial Grain,
The Purple Treasure’s Eight Harmonious Feast.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Black-Sound of the Great Illuminating Wheel.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Guikang*-Sound of Dharma Wealth.
The Cavern’s Purity of Inexhaustible Resources,
The Black Pearl of Auspicious Radiance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Gujiao*-Sound of the Primordial Mother.
The Cavern’s True Heavenly Emperor’s Robe,
The Yellow Skirt with Purple Radiance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Shuqian*-Sound of the Golden Mother.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Lotus Bark’s *Pojing*-Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Pan*-Sound of the Purple Radiant Skirt.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Ji*-Sound of Great Perfect Penetration.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Gui*-Sound of Wondrous Heavenly Flowers.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *You*-Sound of the Phoenix-Dragon’s Flight.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Light-Sound of Great Suchness.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Precious Moon’s Pure *Chen*-Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Cen*-Sun’s Wisdom Illumination.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Crystal Net’s *Xieli*-Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Zhu*-Sound of the Great Origin’s Song.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Mo*-Sound of the Compassionate Father’s Chapter.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Constellations’ Morning Sovereign’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Carved Rose’s Wondrous Fragrant Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Sweetbriar’s Great Mystery’s Fragrance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Inner Fragrance of the Central Emperor’s Incense.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Pure Scenery’s Jade *Chen*-Incense.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The True Incense of the Cavern’s Divine Fragrance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Divine Sound of the Great Purity’s Chant.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Wondrous Gate’s True *Yan*-Incense.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Qi Mother’s Robe of Floral Fragrance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Sage-Sound of the Heavenly Treasure Sovereign.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The True Emperor’s Numinous Sound of Life.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Immortal King’s Divine Aperture Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Master’s Aperture of the Mysterious Center’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Gezhou*-Sound of Great Illumination.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *He*-Sound of Morning Sun’s Radiance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Piao*-Sound of Jade Florescence’s Coolness.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Elephant-Sound of Supreme Virtue’s Tone.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Initial Sound of Great Auspiciousness.

The Emperor’s Heart *Tanchizhun*,
The Dark and Tranquil Sound of Mysterious Penetration.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Profound Sound of the Lofty Contemplative King.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Responsive Sound of Southern Longevity.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Pure and Harmonious Sound of Wondrous Transformation.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Proud and Lofty Sound of the Eight Floras.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Auspicious Sound of the Longevity Immortal King.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Sound of Receiving the Pure Emperor’s Mandate.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Auspicious Cloud’s Primordial Elder’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Ayiliu* Chanting Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Yuli* Flourishing *Puyu* Power.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Rejoicing Great Brahma-Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Illuminating Lofty Sound of Returning to the Mysterious.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Xuyuan* Dragon Net’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Cavern’s Floating Jade-Sound of Life.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Empty Numinous Sound of Ze and Luo.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Green Net’s Cloud-Flying Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Nayu* Mara’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Mirror-Embracing Sound of Fate’s Countenance.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Vast and Radiant Divine Tassel’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Meditative *You* of the White Primordial Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The *Poni* Winding Marsh’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Brahma-Sprout’s *Xiaoyu* Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Far-Reaching Sound of the Boundless.
The *Yuzhu* Winding Head’s Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Yanyou* Self-Discerning Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Pinshou* Supporting Canopy’s Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.

The Everlasting Mulberry’s Hollow Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Jueyu*’s Supreme Mystery Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Tuoluo*’s Cloud-Uniting Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Flying Deva’s *Shatuo* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Radiant Jade’s Harmonious Center Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Azure Heavens’ Floating *Li* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Preserving Truth’s Fierce Brilliance Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Cavernous Mystery’s Vast Expanse Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Human Heart’s *Zhena* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Great Cavern’s Boundless Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.

Three Thousand Mystic Works perfected,
Eight Hundred Exalted Rites observed.
Noble ranks birth the mushroom’s bloom,
Cinnabar and azure gleam with numinous treasure’s light.
Fulfillment attains the Ten Penetrations,
The form ascends to the Three Subtleties.
The *Great Cavern Sutra*’s Auspicious Divine Mantra Method concludes.

chunks.original_text: 大洞经吉祥神咒法 经名：大洞经吉祥神咒法。 撰人不详，约出於宋元。 一卷。 底本出处：《万历续道藏》。 大洞经吉祥神咒法 一百大吉祥檀炽钧音神咒 元始善巧清和开谛法门一百大吉祥檀炽钧玉音神咒： 普光弘济尊，太玄真一心。 大洞丹泓劾，清和吉祥音。 始始始三炁，吉祥檀炽钧。 梵音大梵炁，吉祥檀炽钧。 天音净妙音，吉祥檀炽钧。 帝心三昧音，吉祥檀炽钧。 玉音芳华彩，吉祥檀炽钧。 虚音道光师，吉祥檀炽钧。 无音妙通玄，吉祥檀炽钧。 道祖内音宣，吉祥檀炽钧。 太一元皇音，吉祥檀炽钧。 上音妙行音，吉祥檀炽钧。 金音无等音，吉祥檀炽钧。 九灵玉母音，吉祥檀炽钧。 东父神音华，吉祥檀炽钧。 伊音洞渊尊，吉祥檀炽钧。 泓洞灵音悲，吉祥檀炽钧。 骙音洞空香，吉祥檀炽钧。 轮音大龙光，吉祥檀炽钧。 风音八和神，吉祥檀炽钧。 翮音洞观华，吉祥檀炽钧。 音洞明灯，吉祥檀炽钧。 凝除天帝音，吉祥檀炽钧。 音洞玄水，吉祥檀炽钧。 霄明太华香，吉祥檀炽钧。 核音洞微果，吉祥檀炽钧。 抽音洞灵芽，吉祥檀炽钧。 泓劾中音，吉祥檀炽钧。 洞源金醴浆，吉祥檀炽钧。 琼瑰玄膺味，吉祥檀炽钧。 馈欷金饭音，吉祥檀炽钧。 洞虚黄元粮，紫珍八和飨。 吉祥檀炽钧，缁音大明轮。 吉祥檀炽钧，禬伉音法财。 洞清无尽资，骊珠吉光祸。 吉祥檀炽钧，觚斠元母音。 洞真天帝衣，黄裳紫光裙。 吉祥檀炽钧，枢金母音。 吉祥檀炽钧，莲艘婆景音。 吉祥檀炽钧，盘音紫光裙。 吉祥檀炽钧，机音大圆通。 吉祥檀炽钧，龟音妙天花。 吉祥檀炽钧，猷音鸟龙飞。 吉祥檀炽钧，光音大真如。 吉祥檀炽钧，宝月清宸音。 吉祥檀炽钧，岑日慧明光。 吉祥檀炽钧，晶罗颉力音。 吉祥檀炽钧，注音太原歌。 吉祥檀炽钧，磨音慈父章。 吉祥檀炽钧，星斗晨皇音。 吉祥檀炽钧，雕蔷妙香音。 吉祥檀炽钧，蘅薇太玄香。 吉祥檀炽钧，内香中帝香。 吉祥檀炽钧，清景玉宸香。 吉祥檀炽钧，真香洞神香。 吉祥檀炽钧，神音太清谣。 吉祥檀炽钧，妙门真香。 吉祥檀炽钧，气母袭华香。 吉祥檀炽钧，圣音天宝皇。 吉祥檀炽钧，真帝灵音生。 吉祥檀炽钧，仙王神窦音。 吉祥檀炽钧，师窦玄中音。 吉祥檀炽钧，歌周音大明。 吉祥檀炽钧，劾音姿晞阳。 吉祥檀炽钧，骠音玉华凉。 吉祥檀炽钧，象音上德音。 吉祥檀炽钧，初音大吉祥。 帝心檀炽钧，冥寂玄通音。 吉祥檀炽钧，深音高观王。 吉祥檀炽钧，应音南长生。 吉祥檀炽钧，清和妙化音。 吉祥檀炽钧，傲睨音八华。 吉祥檀炽钧，福音寿仙王。 吉祥檀炽钧，禀无清帝音。 吉祥檀炽钧，庆云始老音。 吉祥檀炽钧，阿弈流吟音。 吉祥檀炽钧，郁丽菩育钧。 吉祥檀炽钧，答庆大梵音。 吉祥檀炽钧，明上回玄音。 吉祥檀炽钧，吁贠龙罗音。 吉祥檀炽钧，洞浮生玉音。 吉祥檀炽钧，空灵泽洛音。 吉祥檀炽钧，绿罗云飞音。 吉祥檀炽钧，那育魔罗音。 吉祥檀炽钧，镜揽运容音。 吉祥檀炽钧，廓奕神缨音。 吉祥檀炽钧，禅猷白元音。 吉祥檀炽钧，婆尼宛薮音。 吉祥檀炽钧，梵萌萧嵎音。 吉祥檀炽钧，易遐无极音。 郁竺宛首音，吉祥檀炽钧。 延由自辨音，吉祥檀炽钧。 品首扶盖音，吉祥檀炽钧。

The *Poni* Winding Marsh’s Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Brahma-Sprout’s *Xiaoyu* Sound.
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*,
The Far-Reaching Sound of the Boundless.

Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.

chunks.original_text: 长桑栢空音，吉祥檀炽钧。 玃育上玄音，吉祥檀炽钧。 陀罗合云音，吉祥檀炽钧。 飞天沙陀音，吉祥檀炽钧。 瑛鲜和中音，吉祥檀炽钧。 碧落浮黎音，吉祥檀炽钧。 保真恶奕音，吉祥檀炽钧。 洞妙恢漠音，吉祥檀炽钧。 人心择那音，吉祥檀炽钧。 大洞无量音，吉祥檀炽钧。 玄功三千圆，妙行八百斋。 贵品生芝英，丹碧灵宝辉。 圆满证十通，举形升三微。 大洞经吉祥神咒法竟
chunks.translated_text:
The Everlasting Mulberry’s Hollow Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Jueyu*’s Supreme Mystery Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The *Tuoluo*’s Cloud-Uniting Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Flying Deva’s *Shatuo* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Radiant Jade’s Harmonious Center Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Azure Heavens’ Floating *Li* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Preserving Truth’s Fierce Brilliance Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Cavernous Mystery’s Vast Expanse Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Human Heart’s *Zhena* Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.
The Great Cavern’s Boundless Sound,
Auspicious *Tanchizhun*.

Three Thousand Mystic Works perfected,
Eight Hundred Exalted Rites observed.
Noble ranks birth the mushroom’s bloom,
Cinnabar and azure gleam with numinous treasure’s light.
Fulfillment attains the Ten Penetrations,
The form ascends to the Three Subtleties.
The *Great Cavern Sutra*’s Auspicious Divine Mantra Method concludes.
